content: piece repeat on left edge of piece now bring side seams to center so that the four original corners of the piece meet in the center working from outside toward center attach yarn at right edge of the unsewn seam and work slip_stitch across toward center stopping 6 from center to leave an opening for inserting the pillow form repeat for remaining seam turn pillow cover right side out and felt following instructions below before felting be sure that all ends are woven in securely felting instructions set washing machine to low water level hot water heavy duty agitation and add a drop or two of mild liquid soap such as ivory liquid place pillow cover in washer along with old denim jeans let the machine agitate the pillow cover for 5 minutes then check to see how it is felting do not let the water drain out or go to rinse cycle but continue to check every 5 minutes until pillow cover has reached desired amount of felting sample took about 15 minutes to felt keep resetting machine to agitation cycle if necessary when pillow cover is desired size remove from washer and rinse thoroughly in lukewarm water in sink press between dry towels to remove as much water as possible then lay it flat on dry towels shaping to make sure it is square leave to dry completely in a place with good air circulation when cover is completely dry insert pillow form or fiberfill stuffing and sew opening closed with a length of matching wool fluff up eyelash accent and enjoy your new pillow copyright 2017 2005 kathy north www ravelry com/designers/kathy-north for personal or charity use only do not duplicate pattern for commercial purposes 2
